text: Dang ta lai dao mai de yan de quan bian de shihou, ta kanjian you yiqun ren zai nali yin yang. Ta faxian chu tamen wai hai you liang nuzi, lanzhe tamen lia de yang qun. Ta shuo:“Nimen lia weisheme zheyang ne?” Ta lia shuo:“Women yao dao mu renmen shi tamen de yang likai quanshui, cai de yin women de yang, women de fuqin shi yi wei long zhong de laoren.”
